informal_prefix: A continuous, strictly increasing function $\mu \colon (0, \infty) \rightarrow (0, \infty)$ is a modulus of continuity if $\mu(s) \rightarrow 0$ as $s \rightarrow 0$.   ‚àÄ U : ‚Ñï ‚Üí Set X,

  (‚àÉ t : Finset ‚Ñï, (univ : Set X) ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ i ‚àà t, U i)

  ‚àÄ U : Set X, Infinite U ‚Üí ‚àÉ x ‚àà U, ClusterPt x (ùìü U)
